attributes.action: Unban the XL bully and ban irresponsible owners
attributes.additional_details: It's not the breed of the dog thtlat is dangerous it's the owners and back yard breeders that are dangerous and need to be banned from ever owning or breeding a dog again
attributes.background: Unbanned the the xl bully and ban owners that are irresponsible with there dogs

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions which you may wish to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Require licences for owners of XL Bully dogs instead of a ban/muzzles/neutering: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650449

Bring back a Dog Licence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
